abstract: Steel Partners, the hedge fund run by activist investor Warren G. Lichtenstein, helped oust most of the board of Japanese wig maker Aderans Holdings on Thursday, the first time management of a Japanese firm has been ejected under pressure from an activist fund.
lead_paragraph: Steel Partners, the hedge fund run by activist investor Warren G. Lichtenstein, helped oust most of the board of Japanese wig maker Aderans Holdings on Thursday, the first time management of a Japanese firm has been ejected under pressure from an activist fund.

headline.main: Lichtenstein’s Steel Partners Ousts Board of Japan’s Aderans
